name: Lightsworn Courtyard
text: Once per turn: You can target up to 2 "Lightsworn" cards in your GY or that are banished; shuffle them into the Deck, then send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY. If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: Draw 1 card, reveal it, and if it is not a "Lightsworn" card send it to the GY. You can only activate 1 "Lightsworn Courtyard" per turn.
